text: Unko humne woh kuch diya tha jo tum logon ko nahin diya hai. Unko humne kaan, aankehin aur dil sab kuch de rakkhe thay, magar na woh kaan unke kisi kaam aaye, na aankhein, na dil, kyunke woh Allah ki aayat ka inkar karte thay, aur usi cheez ke phair mein woh aa gaye jiska woh mazaak udate thay
